version_description:
Now for you to achieve your savings goals, we have enabled the product, BAC Objectives which will allow you to save in an easy and systemic way.
You can enjoy the following features:
- Creating savings targets
- Management of current objectives: visualization of progress, modification, all relevant details

We renewed the login screen, that way you can find out new services and applications that BAC Credomatic offers to you to make your life easier.
With this new version now you can do:
- Card PIN renewal
- Replacement request for deteriorated Credit Card
- Replacement request for lost or stolen card
- Increase Credit Card Limit
- Change Credit Card Type
- And more service requests according to your country.
In addition, we add the functionality to Costa Rican users to make SINPE Móvil* transfers to other usersassociated to the service, just by typing the cell phone number to make the transaction.

Thank you for your comments they are always taken into account.

BAC Móvil at your fingertips! Now you can login to our app using Touch ID.  

To active it, only login as usual with your username and password (and Token device in case you have it) and select the “Touch ID”check box, then press “Login”button, accept the Terms & Conditions and it is ready! You can then login using only your fingerprint.
  * The service is available only for iPhone devices that count with the Touch ID functionality. 
* To activate the service in the app, the Touch ID function must be previously activated in your device.

BAC Móvil at your fingertips! Now you can login to our app using Touch ID.  

To active it, only login as usual with your username and password (and Token device in case you have it) and select the “Touch ID”check box, then press “Login”button, accept the Terms & Conditions and it is ready! You can then login using only your fingerprint.
  * The service is available only for iPhone devices that count with the Touch ID functionality. 
* To activate the service in the app, the Touch ID function must be previously activated in your device.

BAC Móvil at your fingertips! Now you can login to our app using Touch ID.  

To active it, only login as usual with your username and password (and Token device in case you have it) and select the “Touch ID”check box, then press “Login”button, accept the Terms & Conditions and it is ready! You can then login using only your fingerprint.
  * The service is available only for iPhone devices that count with the Touch ID functionality. 
* To activate the service in the app, the Touch ID function must be previously activated in your device.

Now you can make more online Bill Payments at the reach of your fingertips*

-Log into the app and go to the "Payments" Menu, then select the new option "My Payments", to visualise your favourite payments previously registered in Sucursal Electrónica, or you can also search and add more Bill Payments through the searching bar.
-Get email notifications when a bill is paid.

*Available for Guatemala, Costa Rica and Panama. This feature will be available soon for Honduras and Nicaragua as well.

Now in Costa Rica you can pay the Annual Vehicle Circulation Tax, using your bank account or your Credomatic card with Tasa Cero or Mini Cuotas.

- We renew our Mobile Banking application.
- From now on, the payments of services and refills that you have registered as favorites, do not need more of the BAC Code to apply the payment. For security, only when you make a new payment, you will be asked to enter this code.
- Minor Adjustments.

We continue to add value to the best mobile banking in Central America!

1. Do you know how much your supermarket purchases represent in regards to all your expenses? Now you can see this and more graphically with the new test option of My Finance *.
2.- Access the new Push Notification center and watch news and information we have sent you.
3. Our customers in El Salvador, now have the option to make ACH transactions through "UNI" to others Banks within the local financial system.

*In this test version, 2 months of transactional history data will be shown. Soon you will see the daily transactions.
